name: The Visionary
short_description: You see beyond reality. Your dreams often reveal abstract truths or future possibilities.

name: The Wanderer
short_description: You're on a journey — emotionally, mentally, or spiritually. Your dreams often involve movement and discovery.

name: The Guardian
short_description: You dream of protection and responsibility. You often take care of others in your dreams.

name: The Shadow Walker
short_description: You face inner fears and buried truths. Your dreams explore the darker parts of your psyche.

name: The Illusionist
short_description: You bend reality in your dreams. Surreal landscapes, paradoxes, and shifting identities are common.

name: The Healer
short_description: Your dreams often deal with healing — emotionally or relationally. You bring peace to dream chaos.

name: The Seeker
short_description: You search for meaning, signs, or answers. Your dreams are full of symbols and unanswered questions.

name: The Trickster
short_description: Your dreams challenge logic and norms. You're playful, chaotic, or unpredictable even in sleep.

name: The Architect
short_description: You dream with structure. Recurring themes, patterns, or places reveal a deep inner design.

name: The Echo
short_description: You reflect the emotional weight of your daily life. Your dreams echo the unresolved, unspoken, or suppressed.
